thread.title: John K.
thread.title_full: Saatchi Art reviewed by John K.

author: John K.
title: John K.
text:
Great shopping experience!
Our assigned curator stuck with us as we told her in general terms what we were looking for and over time she made several recommendations. From those recommendations, the curator continued to winnow out those that we didn't like and build a portfolio of what we did like, suggesting new art. Eventually, we were lead to the precise piece we were looking for!
I highly recommend the site. It was a very enjoyable way to shop for art.
